title: Can't Log In
body: Ever since July 30 I haven't been able to sign in, I have tried everything and it just wont let me sign in. It has said there is a connection issue but I believe it isn't. Has this been happening to anyone else or is it just me?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey guys,

What ISP are you using?

Mindstar
I have not been able to login since the 24th.
Nope not just you, I can't connect to server at all
